document_data.name: Narth Tezrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Narth Tezrin''' was an resident of [[Triboar]] and member of the [[Lionshield Coster]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Narth managed the [[Lion's Share]] shop together with [[Alaestra Ulgar]].
document_data.Personality: Narth had an adventurous spirit. He sought to become a person of renown, no matter the risks. He adored his colleague Alaestra and this stopped him from running away in search of adventures.
